item.title: I lost 18 pounds and took 650,000 steps. Rookie numbers I know. Thanks for following along. I know it's long but I have a no part 2 policy. Now to get ready for my next race in 3 weeks, Cocodona 250 miler. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #ArizonaMonster

item.title: Cocodona 250 starts at 5am PST. I will be wearing a GPS tracker. You can track me on a map. Reminder, that I'm not sponsored, this is just what I use. Take it with a grain of salt. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #runtok #cocodona250

item.title: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
